no_cc_object.title: No credit card needed
no_cc_object.description: All options are bookable without a credit card.

hotel_important_information_with_codes.phrase: This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties.

A damage deposit of PKR 10000 is required on arrival. That's about USD 35. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

1412597102.description: Boasting a private entrance, this air-conditioned apartment comes with 1 living room, 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a bath and a shower. Guests can make meals in the kitchen that features a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an oven. The spacious apartment features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a washing machine, soundproof walls, a mini-bar as well as city views. The unit has 2 beds.

facilities.name: Books, DVDs or music for children

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in PKR has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

stages.text_refundable: You'll get a full refund if you cancel before 5:59 PM on May 22, 2025.
stages.text: Free cancellation until 5:59 PM on May 22

stages.text_refundable: If you cancel after 6:00 PM on May 22, 2025, you won't be eligible for a refund.

cancellation.description: You can cancel for free until 6:00 PM on the day of arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel after 6:00 PM on the day of arrival. If you don't show up, the no-show fee will be the same as the cancellation fee.

block.name: One-Bedroom Apartment with Balcony - Free cancellation
